parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> 1

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - ListNBox

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the cell's right-picture. The picture is set to the end of the '''row''', the ''column'' parameter does not matter.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> The picture is searched in the mission, directory, the campaign directory's dtaExt subdirectory, and the data bank (or directory).</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[lnbSetPictureRight]] [idc, [row, column], path]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> row: [[Number]] - 0-based index (first row is 0, second is 1, etc)

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> column: [[Number]] - 0-based index (first column is 0, second is 1, etc)

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> path: [[String]] - the picture's file path

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> ctrl [[lnbSetPicture]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[row, column], path]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> ctrl: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> row: [[Number]] - 0-based index (first row is 0, second is 1, etc)

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> column: [[Number]] - 0-based index (first column is 0, second is 1, etc)

</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> path: [[String]] - the picture's file path

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[lnbSetPictureRight]] [1, [0, 0], "Picture.paa"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_ctrl [[lnbSetPictureRight]] [ [0, 0], "\A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Ranks\lieutenant_gs.paa"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[lnbPictureRight]]
</value></part></template></root>
